traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The glabrezu makes four attacks: two with its pincers and two with its fists. Alternatively, it makes two attacks with its pincers and casts one spell.

actions.name: Pincer
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Fist
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The glabrezu's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}). The glabrezu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
